name: Hammena Dreams
description:
Hey there,

This is a game I made in 2 months. I had some help from Clink. (thank you Clink)

It's a hard boss fighting game that it lets the player explore their abilities and learn the enemy patterns.

Currently it has 2 bosses. And the controls are:
WASD = move
LMB = Attack/Dash
Space = Use Item

SPECIAL THANKS TO JOHN KYRITSIS FOR HIS AWESOME MUSIC!
check his soundcloud for more: https://soundcloud.com/john-76231271

I'm currently making another short game. If you want to support me or learn more about it check my Patreon or join my Discord server: https://discord.gg/ceqfCKb

Game's Theme

Everyone had a childhood dream when they were younger. To be an astronaut, a knight. Become an explorer and adventure across a world of imagination to free it from the dark essence that took over it. 

Run, explore, dash ‘n’ slash, use the power of ancient relics and defeat the monsters left by your fallen friends to take back your friends' memorial tokens, in order to remember them, without their demons. 

A fun and interactive exploration and boss dueling game with a unique approach on cancer, causing it to be an emotional roller coaster once the player realizes the true meaning of the game.
